column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Love this place! I had the Tonkotsu Black Ramen and it was so delicious. The pork was so tender and the seasoned soft boiled egg is so flavorful
column2: it makes the dish. The food was top notch
column3: but the service and management was even better. They went above and beyond to make my meal perfect. I will definitely be back!
